name: The Pre-Renegade Sector Collection
description:
A collection of my early games, originally released online between 2007 and 2011.

I'm releasing these games as-is and don't stand by their quality or content.

WARNING: Many of these games feature flashing lights and fast-moving images.

Contents:

  • Charge the Lasers
    • SHMUP with match 3 elements.  Shoot 3 enemies of the same color in a row to charge up your laser beam and damage the boss.
  • Your Sensibilities are Useless Here
    • Control 2 ships and bounce a projectile between them in this colorful arcade-action game.
  • Dadaists Gone Wild
    • I once saw a photograph of a bunch of indie developers wearing diapers and then I made this game.
  • Dadaists Gone Wild 2 (Demo)
    • I tried to make a sequel to Dadaists Gone Wild and failed.
  • Super PumpNik
    • This had something to do with Dadaists Gone Wild, but I don't really remember what.
  • 4th of July First Contact
    • A short dodge-em-up game jam game.
  • BCE
    • Made for the TIGSource Vaporware Competition.  You play as a cave-man and must defend your village from dinosaurs.
  • By the Torchlight
    • First-person game where you explore a dark cave.
  • Space Captain McCallery Ep. 1-3
    • The original 2D Space Captain McCallery games.  This was the seed from which the entire Renegade Sector grew.
